top_districts.name: Ixelles
why: Great cafe culture around Flagey Square attracts diverse international residents.
Vibrant community events and expat activities foster social connections.
watch_out: Rental prices can spike due to popularity and demand.

top_districts.name: Saint-Gilles
why: Charming streets with brunch spots encourage a vibrant expat lifestyle.
Cultural diversity offers numerous international community events weekly.
watch_out: Noise levels may increase during festivals and events.

top_districts.name: Uccle
why: Peaceful parks like Parc de Woluwe provide an escape from urban life.
Family-friendly environment supports child-friendly amenities and schools.
watch_out: Commutes can be longer due to distance from city center.
